title: What is the quickest way to double my money?
description: I need expert financial advice on this matter.

answers.text: The experts are all in agreement: Just fold it in half.

title: What language do they speak in Cuba?
description: I am planning a vacation there and want to learn some of the vocabulary in preparation.

answers.text: Everyone knows that they speak Cubic in Cuba.
